name: Antony's Adventure
description:
Platform your way to sweet success in this randomly-assembled, hand-drawn game! With random zone placement and random level selection, each playthrough is unique!

You (Antony) and your friends were on your way home, but there was one problem... you all got hungry! The area you ended up in seems to have a lot of fruit, though...

Controls:

Title Screen NavigationW/S or Arrow KeysLeft Stick or D-PadTitle Screen SelectionEnter(Nintendo) ACutscene ProgressionEnter(Nintendo) YSkip CutsceneX(Nintendo) XWalkA/D or Arrow KeysLeft Stick or D-PadJumpW or Arrow Key(Nintendo) A or BDeposit FruitSpace(Nintendo) X or YZoom OutXRight Stick DownZoom InZRight Stick Up

Please let me know if there are any... bugs.
